summary: Provides automated tests for the DCOM runtime implementation in the Impacket library, covering connection handling, interface queries, resource management, COM event processing, and a range of DCOM operations such as ping, remote activation, instance creation, class object retrieval, OXID resolution, and server liveness checks.
business_intent: Ensures the reliability and correctness of DCOM functionality within Impacket, supporting security assessments, network diagnostics, and development validation of remote COM interactions.
